title: Im going to tell you something you already know.
body:
Blitz is too powerful.

I know i know, he's always been powerful and thats not going to change.

but just take a look at him, he is extremely useful at ALL points in the game, take someone powerful like Vayne, she is powerful but has a weak early game (supposedly, i have yet to experience this) or someone like LB who has a really powerful early game, but falls off late. Blitz's lane usually gets firstblood due to his CC, then mid game his roams are so powerful, and his speed boost endures he gets there quicker than other champs. and in late game he is tanky enough to withstand almost anything. He has no weak spot time-wise.

His pull is powerful enough without needing to give him a knock up (that activates instantly after you get pulled so if you dash or flash it still knocks you up) AND a silence.

I have seen (and experienced) on multiple occasions him 1v1 Adc's that were more fed and win (Adc's are supposed to be the ones that kill tanks not the other way around, (because god knows the other damage champs like AP assassins and mages certainly cant.)

its not really fair that he has such powerful disruption, is so tanky, really mobile, AND does so much damage.

He has a 52% win rate (higher than almost all champs) and has a 17% pick rate (meaning that we experience that 52% win rate a lot)

and i know that most comments here will just be "oh blitz is actually easy to counter, and to fight you just .... and you can win" But if it was that easy he wouldn't have a 52% win rate.

there is literally no other champion that makes you groan inside so much when he is picked in ranked.
you know this to be true.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Blitz is only powerful vs low Elo/inexperienced players. His kit utterly fails in the early game against competent players - he's extremely vulnerable to harass and finds it difficult to maintain lane control. The thing that gives him a high win rate in the early game is that he's good at setting up ganks (W in and flash+E or similar), but that can easily be countered by spending more money on wards. Smart players can more easily destroy a Blitz than they can other supports.

no, he's not too powerful. he just has a lot of presence. you know who is too powerful? thresh. he has just as much presence as blitz, but instead of also pulling enemies towards him, he can bring allies to enemies.
And his whole kit is based on one ability.
